thread.title: Another Great Stay
thread.title_full: Another Great Stay - Review of The Marmara Park Avenue, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mac m
title: Another Great Stay
text:
We stayed last year and I couldn't wait to come back. This time, however, it took us 26 hours to fly from Montreal to NY because of a blizzard. We missed our first night in New York and were totally wiped by the time we got there. The hotel was incredibly sympathetic and Ruchi, without saying anything, put us in an absolutely gorgeous 1-bed apartment. Wow. It really made up for the misery of the whole Air Canada thing.
Thanks to the whole staff who are wonderful and especially Ruchi.
